TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ArcSegment extends System.Windows.Media.PathSegment
Public NotInheritable Class ArcSegment Inherits PathSegment
public ref class ArcSegment sealed : System::Windows::Media::PathSegment

summary.span: 表示两点之间的一条椭圆弧。

span.span: Represents an elliptical arc between two points.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用对象来存储对象和其他段。Use a object to store objects and other segments. 由其起点和终点，x 轴半径和 y 的半径，x 轴旋转的比例，值，该值指示弧是否应大于 180 度，并描述在其中绘制弧线的方向的值定义椭圆弧。An elliptical arc is defined by its start and end points, x- and y-radius, x-axis rotation factor, a value indicating whether the arc should be greater than 180 degrees, and a value describing the direction in which the arc is drawn. 类不包含弧线的起始点的属性; 它只定义它表示的弧线的目标点。The class does not contain a property for the starting point of the arc; it only defines the destination point of the arc it represents. 圆弧的起点是当前的点到添加。The beginning point of the arc is the current point of the to which the is added. 下图演示不同的终结点， ，和设置。The following illustrations demonstrate the different end point, , and settings. ![具有不同 Point 设置的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-point.png "具有不同 Point 设置的 Arcsegment")![ArcSegments with different Point settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-point.png "ArcSegments with different Point settings") ![具有不同大小设置的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-size.png "具有不同大小设置的 Arcsegment")![ArcSegments with different Size settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-size.png "ArcSegments with different Size settings") ![具有不同 RotationAngle 设置的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-rotationangle.png "具有不同 RotationAngle 设置的 Arcsegment")![ArcSegments with different RotationAngle settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-rotationangle.png "ArcSegments with different RotationAngle settings") ## IsLargeArc 和 SweepDirectionIsLargeArc and SweepDirection 对于大多数的特定位置、 大小和旋转弧线，有四个不同的弧线可绘制;和属性指示要使用哪个弧线。For most arcs of a particular position, size, and rotation, there are four different arcs that can be drawn; the and properties indicate which arc to use. 四个候选弧扫掠，两个表示大弧与扫描的 180 度或更高版本，另外两个表示小于或等于扫描 180 度的小弧。Of the four candidate arc sweeps, two represent large arcs with sweeps of 180 degrees or greater, and two represent smaller arcs with sweeps 180 degrees or less. 如果是**true**，则这两个较大弧扫掠之一就是所选; 否则为如果是**false**、 一个扫描所选的较小的弧线。If is **true**, then one of the two larger arc sweeps is chosen; otherwise, if is **false**, one of the smaller arc sweeps is chosen. 剩余的两个圆弧候选人每个绘制不同方向：或。The remaining two arc candidates are each drawn in a different direction: or . 属性指定应使用哪一个。The property specifies which one to use. 下图显示了不同和设置。The following illustrations show different and settings. ![具有不同 IsLargeArc 设置的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-islargearc.png "具有不同 IsLargeArc 设置的 Arcsegment")![ArcSegments with different IsLargeArc settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-islargearc.png "ArcSegments with different IsLargeArc settings") 具有不同 IsLargeArc 设置的 ArcSegment 对象ArcSegment objects with different IsLargeArc settings ![具有不同 SweepDirection 设置的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-sweepdirection.png "具有不同 SweepDirection 设置的 Arcsegment")![ArcSegments with different SweepDirection settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-sweepdirection.png "ArcSegments with different SweepDirection settings") 具有不同 SweepDirection 设置的 ArcSegment 对象ArcSegment objects with different SweepDirection settings ## Freezable 功能Freezable Features 是一种对象。An is a type of object. 璝惠功能，例如冻结和克隆，请参阅[Freezable 对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For information about features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类定义它表示的弧线的目标点; 圆弧的起点是当前的点到该添加。The class defines only the destination point of the arc it represents; the beginning point of the arc is the current point of the , to which the is added. 对于最椭圆弧的特定位置、 大小和旋转，有四个不同的弧线可绘制;`largeArc`和`sweepDirection`参数指示要使用哪个弧线。For most elliptical arcs of a particular position, size, and rotation, there are four different arcs that can be drawn; the `largeArc` and `sweepDirection` parameters indicate which arc to use. 四个候选弧扫掠，两个表示大弧与扫描的 180 度或更高版本，另外两个表示小于或等于扫描 180 度的小弧。Of the four candidate arc sweeps, two represent large arcs with sweeps of 180 degrees or greater, and two represent smaller arcs with sweeps 180 degrees or less. 如果`largeArc`是**true**，则这两个较大弧扫掠之一就是所选; 否则为如果`largeArc`是**false**、 一个扫描所选的较小的弧线。If `largeArc` is **true**, then one of the two larger arc sweeps is chosen; otherwise, if `largeArc` is **false**, one of the smaller arc sweeps is chosen. 如果`sweepDirection`是，正角方向绘制弧线。If `sweepDirection` is , the arc is drawn in a positive-angle direction. 如果`sweepDirection`是，按负角方向绘制弧线。If `sweepDirection` is , the arc is drawn in a negative-angle direction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类定义它表示的弧线的目标点; 圆弧的起点是当前的点到该添加。The class defines only the destination point of the arc it represents; the beginning point of the arc is the current point of the , to which the is added. 对于最椭圆弧的特定位置、 大小和旋转，有四个不同的弧线可绘制;`largeArc`和`sweepDirection`参数指示要使用哪个弧线。For most elliptical arcs of a particular position, size, and rotation, there are four different arcs that can be drawn; the `largeArc` and `sweepDirection` parameters indicate which arc to use. 四个候选弧扫掠，两个表示大弧与扫描的 180 度或更高版本，另外两个表示小于或等于扫描 180 度的小弧。Of the four candidate arc sweeps, two represent large arcs with sweeps of 180 degrees or greater, and two represent smaller arcs with sweeps 180 degrees or less. 如果`largeArc`是**true**，则这两个较大弧扫掠之一就是所选; 否则为如果`largeArc`是**false**、 一个扫描所选的较小的弧线。If `largeArc` is **true**, then one of the two larger arc sweeps is chosen; otherwise, if `largeArc` is **false**, one of the smaller arc sweeps is chosen. 如果`sweepDirection`是，正角方向绘制弧线。If `sweepDirection` is , the arc is drawn in a positive-angle direction. 如果`sweepDirection`是，按负角方向绘制弧线。If `sweepDirection` is , the arc is drawn in a negative-angle direction.

param.name: point
param.span: 圆弧的终点；圆弧的起点定义为要添加 的 的当前点。

span.span: The destination point of the arc; the start point of the arc is defined as the current point of the to which the is added.

param.name: size
param.span: 圆弧的 x 轴和 y 轴半径。x 轴半径由 结构的 属性指定，y 轴半径由 结构的 属性指定。

span.span: The x- and y-radius of the arc. The x-radius is specified by the structure's property, and the y-radius is specified by the structure's property.

param.name: rotationAngle
param.span: 椭圆的 X 轴旋转。

span.span: The x-axis rotation of the ellipse.

param.name: isLargeArc
param.span: 圆弧是否应大于 180 度。

span.span: Whether the arc should be greater than 180 degrees.

param.name: sweepDirection
param.span: 若按正角方向绘制圆弧，则设置为 ；若要按负角方向绘制圆弧，则设置为 。

span.span: Set to to draw the arc in a positive angle direction; set to to draw the arc in a negative angle direction.

param.name: isStroked
param.span: 若要在使用 呈现段时绘制圆弧，则设置为 true；否则设置为 false。

span.span: Set to true to stroke the arc when a is used to render the segment; otherwise, false.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结对象 (或任何对象)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 为方便起见，此方法隐藏继承的版本使用的强类型实现。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于大多数的特定位置、 大小和旋转弧线，有四个不同的弧线可绘制;和属性指示要使用哪个弧线。For most arcs of a particular position, size, and rotation, there are four different arcs that can be drawn; the and properties indicate which arc to use. 四个候选弧扫掠，两个表示大弧与扫描的 180 度或更高版本，另外两个表示小于或等于扫描 180 度的小弧。Of the four candidate arc sweeps, two represent large arcs with sweeps of 180 degrees or greater, and two represent smaller arcs with sweeps 180 degrees or less. 如果是**true**，则这两个较大弧扫掠之一就是所选; 否则为如果是**false**、 一个扫描所选的较小的弧线。If is **true**, then one of the two larger arc sweeps is chosen; otherwise, if is **false**, one of the smaller arc sweeps is chosen. 剩余的两个圆弧候选人每个绘制不同方向：或。The remaining two arc candidates are each drawn in a different direction: or . 属性指定应使用哪一个。The property specifies which one to use. 下图显示了除完全相同的两个椭圆弧形其设置。The following illustration shows two elliptical arcs that are identical except for their settings. ![具有不同 IsLargeArc 设置的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-islargearc.png "具有不同 IsLargeArc 设置的 Arcsegment")![ArcSegments with different IsLargeArc settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-islargearc.png "ArcSegments with different IsLargeArc settings") 具有不同 IsLargeArc 设置的 ArcSegment 对象ArcSegment objects with different IsLargeArc settings ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 **，则返回 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|无None|

summary.span: 获取或设置椭圆弧的终结点。

span.span: Gets or sets the endpoint of the elliptical arc.
The point to which the arc is drawn.
The default value is (0,0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类定义它表示的弧线的目标点; 圆弧的起点是当前的点到添加。The class defines only the destination point of the arc it represents; the beginning point of the arc is the current point of the to which the is added. 如果圆弧线段的起始点和终结点是相同的不能绘制弧。If the arc segment's start point and end point are the same, no arc is drawn. 对于大多数的特定位置、 大小和旋转弧线，有四个不同的弧线可绘制;和属性指示要使用哪个弧线。For most arcs of a particular position, size, and rotation, there are four different arcs that can be drawn; the and properties indicate which arc to use. 四个候选弧扫掠，两个表示大弧与扫描的 180 度或更高版本，另外两个表示小于或等于扫描 180 度的小弧。Of the four candidate arc sweeps, two represent large arcs with sweeps of 180 degrees or greater, and two represent smaller arcs with sweeps 180 degrees or less. 如果是**true**，则这两个较大弧扫掠之一就是所选; 否则为如果是**false**、 一个扫描所选的较小的弧线。If is **true**, then one of the two larger arc sweeps is chosen; otherwise, if is **false**, one of the smaller arc sweeps is chosen. 剩余的两个圆弧候选人每个绘制不同方向：或。The remaining two arc candidates are each drawn in a different direction: or . 属性指定应使用哪一个。The property specifies which one to use. 下图显示了除完全相同的几条椭圆弧其设置。The following illustration shows several elliptical arcs that are identical except for their settings. ![具有不同 Point 设置的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-point.png "具有不同 Point 设置的 Arcsegment")![ArcSegments with different Point settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-point.png "ArcSegments with different Point settings") 多个具有不同 Point 设置的 ArcSegment 对象Several ArcSegment objects with different Point settings ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 **，则返回 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|无None|

summary.span: 获取或设置椭圆围绕 x 轴旋转的量（以度为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount (in degrees) by which the ellipse is rotated about the x-axis.

value.span: 椭圆围绕 x 轴旋转的量（以度为单位）。

span.span: The amount (in degrees) by which the ellipse is rotated about the x-axis.
The default value is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下图显示了除完全相同的几条椭圆弧其设置。The following illustration shows several elliptical arcs that are identical except for their settings. ![具有不同 RotationAngle 设置的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-rotationangle.png "具有不同 RotationAngle 设置的 Arcsegment")![ArcSegments with different RotationAngle settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-rotationangle.png "ArcSegments with different RotationAngle settings") 多个具有不同 RotationAngle 设置的 ArcSegment 对象Several ArcSegment objects with different RotationAngle settings 请注意，是否弧的宽度和高度相同，设置此属性没有任何作用。Note that, if the arc's width and height are the same, setting this property has no effect. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 **，则返回 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|无None|

The default value is 0,0.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是以 方向还是以 方向绘制弧。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the arc is drawn in the or direction.

value.span: 一个指定弧的绘制方向的值。

span.span: A value that specifies the direction in which the arc is drawn.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关与给定， ，开始点，并结束，可能会出现四个不同的弧线。For an with a given , , start point, and end , four different arcs are possible. 指定属性可能的弧数量减少到两个： 一段弧线，从起点到结束绘制中方向和终结点在从起始点绘制一段弧线方向。Specifying the property reduces the number of possible arcs to two: an arc drawn from the start point to the end in a direction and an arc drawn from the start point to the end point in a direction. 下图显示了除完全相同的两个椭圆弧形其设置。The following illustration shows two elliptical arcs that are identical except for their settings. ![具有不同 SweepDirection 设置的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-sweepdirection.png "具有不同 SweepDirection 设置的 Arcsegment")![ArcSegments with different SweepDirection settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-sweepdirection.png "ArcSegments with different SweepDirection settings") 具有不同 SweepDirection 设置的 ArcSegment 对象ArcSegment objects with different SweepDirection settings ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 **，则返回 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|无None|

span.span: Identifies the dependency property.
